evidence.text:
Person A: I know it's hard! Walk it back! That's great, couple more ladies! Think about your bikini this summer! You don't want to look like a giant jellyfish on the beach, do you? So keep moving! Couple more... we're almost there... aaand...
Person A: ... give yourselves a hand! That was a GREAT workout!
Person A: I'll see you next week to work more on the lateral abs, those are the hardest to sculpt. In the meantime... Take care of yourself!

Person A: ...Did you follow me here?
Person B: I was just curious to see how things were going for you... And actually I wouldn't be against a little bit of company... It's just good to... talk to someone... you know. Each time you feel a little more lonely... don't you think?
Person B: It gets harder each time to remember that you still deserve to exist...
Person B: ...That this part of yourself is still worth something... That you still matter...
